arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – Luis Enrique doesn’t hold back after the victory
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain won 2-1 against FC Barcelona at the Montjuïc Stadium on Wednesday, in the second matchday of the 2025-2026 Champions League. After this victory, PSG coach Luis Enrique spoke at the press conference. Luis Enrique: “Regardless of the players, our identity remains.” Are you surprised that you were able to win with so many […]

arts.ttl: Ferran Torres, Gerard Martin analyse Barcelona’s narrow loss to PSG – ‘We didn’t play the way we wanted’
arts.sum: Even in defeat, Ferran Torres continued to show why he is one of Barcelona’s key attacking players. The forward scored his fifth goal of the season, proving he deserves the starting role under Hansi Flick. Speaking after the match, he admitted that Barça lost control in the second half, but remained optimistic about the team’s […] The post Ferran Torres, Gerard Martin analyse Barcelona’s narrow loss to PSG – ‘We didn’t play the way we wanted’ appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: De Jong, Eric Garcia review Barcelona 1-2 PSG – ‘Good match to see where we are’
arts.sum: Barcelona captain Frenkie de Jong led his side in last night’s 1-2 defeat against Paris Saint-Germain, a result that served as a stark reality check for the team. Speaking to the media after the match, the Dutch midfielder admitted the loss was disappointing, particularly because PSG managed to snatch victory in the closing moments. “Very […] The post De Jong, Eric Garcia review Barcelona 1-2 PSG – ‘Good match to see where we are’ appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Flick reflects on Barcelona’s defeat to PSG – ‘They deserved the win’
arts.sum: Barcelona manager Hansi Flick was honest in his post-match comments after his team suffered a 1-2 loss to Paris Saint-Germain in the Champions League. Despite Ferran Torres giving Barça the lead early on, the reigning European champions quickly struck back and controlled much of the game. Flick admitted his side were second best on the […] The post Flick reflects on Barcelona’s defeat to PSG – ‘They deserved the win’ appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Nuno Mendes shines against Yamal as PSG beats Barcelona 2-1 in Champions League
arts.sum: Mendes sure looked like one of the best in the position on Wednesday, keeping star Barcelona forward Lamine Yamal at bay and assisting in one of PSG’s goals in a 2-1 win over the Catalan club in the Champions League. Hakimi, a right back who assisted in Gonçalo Ramos’ 90th-minute winner for defending champion PSG, had said ahead of the game that Yamal “will be playing against the best left back in the world.”

arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – The Parisians’ ratings: Mayulu showed the way, Ramos extinguished Montjuic!
arts.sum: This Wednesday, during Matchday 2 of the 2025-2026 Champions League, Paris Saint-Germain faced FC Barcelona at the Montjuïc Stadium. After a match in which the Red and Blues were slow to get going, they came away with a commanding 1-2. Here are our ratings for the Parisians. Goalkeeper – Lucas Chevalier (4) – For the […]

arts.ttl: Flick after UCL loss: Barça 'not at PSG's level'
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain claimed a 2-1 victory at Barcelona on Wednesday in the battle of two favorites for the 2025-26 Champions League.

arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – Nuno Mendes applauds the strength of the group and the mentality
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain won 1-2 against FC Barcelona this Wednesday at the Montjuïc Stadium in Matchday 2 of the 2025-2026 Champions League. After this victory, Parisian full-back Nuno Mendes (23) spoke to Canal+. Nuno Mendes: “We have some injured players, but the players who played today were top-notch.” What a performance, where do you get that […]

arts.ttl: PSG show DNA in 'spectacle' win over Barcelona
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain manager Luis Enrique could only admire the spectacle on display Wednesday night at the Olympic Stadium.

arts.ttl: PSG show Lamine Yamal, Barcelona what it takes to become Champions League winners
arts.sum: Despite missing three talented attackers, including Ballon d'Or winner Ousmane Dembélé, PSG delivered a statement win on the road vs. Barcelona.
